Title: Filament multi-factor authentication (app) recovery codes can be used multiple times
Description: A flaw in the handling of recovery codes for **app-based multi-factor authentication** allows the same recovery code to be reused indefinitely. This issue does **not** affect email-based MFA. It also only applies when recovery codes are enabled.
NotImpacted: All versions before 4.0.0, all versions starting from 4.3.1
